channel.title: How do i run my server correctly.?
channel.description: I have a vps and i got all the file's transfered and can't seem how do i run it? i click run.bat but a black box pop's up and leave's i dont know if i have to portfoward or what???? how please?

item.title: How do i run my server correctly.?
item.dc:creator: @tajkillerscape tajkillerscape
item.description:
@tajkillerscape wrote:

Ok i did the no-ip thing…i downloaded JAVA…and what do i do too the batch file’s?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 30, 2008, 06:43:46 am[/size][hr]Could you like help meh on msn?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i run my server correctly.?

item.title: How do i run my server correctly.?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You have to edit your no-ip info on the no-ip website, change your IP address to the vps’. Download JAVA on the vps, and edit the batch files.

Read full topic
